    private static class ClosedObjectTest.StatementObjectDecorator

      • checkSQLState

        protected void checkSQLState(java.lang.reflect.Method method,
                             java.sql.SQLException sqle)
                      throws java.sql.SQLException
        Checks whether the exception has the expected SQL state (statement is closed). When using embedded, XJ012 is expected. When using the client driver, XCL31 is expected.
        Specified by:
        checkSQLState in class ClosedObjectTest.ObjectDecorator
        Parameters:
        method - a Method value
        sqle - a SQLException value
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if an error occurs
